snippet.title: Wartales | The Skelmar Invasion | RELEASE TRAILER
snippet.description:
Wartales, The Skelmar Invasion is out now!

Ormance, an Edoran county, is a war-torn land designed to immerse you in a struggle for liberation, as you navigate a landscape occupied by the fearsome Skelmars. 

With its fortified villages, imposing strongholds, and treacherous countryside, Ormance offers a grand stage for you to shape the fate of Edoran itself!

Buy it now on Steam: https://shiro.li/25pJqO

#wartales #shirogames #turnbased
